item.description:
Salut, tout le monde!

 

We are back to our good old habits. Upon numerous members requests, we are organizing events again during the week, in addition to the Sunday ones. Our next evening rendez-vous will be on Thursday, July 12 at 7:00 P.M. in Allston, at Tavern In The Square, 5 minutes walk from the trolley ( Green line ) and with at least two bus lines stopping right by the venue.

We are certain many members will welcome this opportunity to further practice the language.

 

Come speak French!

 

À bientôt,

Frantz
item.how_to_find_us: Des tables nous ont été réservées

group.name: The Boston French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Rendez-vous du jeudi soir
